tool.name: OGS: identifySubdomains
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'identifySubdomains'.
tool.command: for i in $mesh; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; identifySubdomains $force #if str($searchlength).strip() != 'None' and str($searchlength).strip() != '': --searchlength '$searchlength' #end if --mesh '$mesh.element_identifier' $subdomain_meshes_filenames --output_prefix output_

param.name: searchlength
param.label: searchlength
param.help: search length determining radius for the node search algorithm. Non-negative floating point number (min = 0)

param.name: mesh
param.label: mesh
param.help: Input (.vtu). The file the bulk mesh

tool.help: This tool runs the **identifySubdomains** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
